bug.short_desc: sasl-cvs configure fails 'for saslauthd' on OSX

long_desc.thetext:
bldg cyrus-sasl-cvs (co, 11 Aug 06) on OSX 10.4.7.
./configure currently fails w/:
... config.status: executing depfiles commands configure: configuring in saslauthd configure: running /bin/sh config/configure - --prefix=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl '--prefix=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl' '--exec-prefix=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl' '--bindir=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl/bin' '--sbindir=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl/sbin' '--libexecdir=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl/libexec' '--localstatedir=/var/Process' '--mandir=/var/Documentation/man' '--with-plugindir=/usr/local/cyrus-sasl/lib/sasl2' '--with-dblib=berkeley' '--with-bdb-libdir=/usr/local/berkeley-db/lib' '--with-bdb-incdir=/usr/local/berkeley-db/include' '--sysconfdir=/var/MailServer/Conf' '--with-saslauthd=/var/MailServer/Process' '--with-dbpath=/var/MailServer/Data/USERS/sasldb2' '--enable-static=no' '--enable-shared=yes' '--with-openssl=/usr/local/ssl' '--with-pam' '--with-des=/usr/local' '--enable-java' '--with-javabase=/Library/Java/Home' '--with-pgsql=/usr/local/pgsql' '--with-mysql=/usr/local/mysql' '--without-sqlite' '--without-gdbm' '--without-ldap' '--with-devrandom' '--with-ipctype=unix' '--disable-checkapop' '--enable-cram' '--enable-digest' '--disable-otp' '--disable-srp' '--disable-srp-setpass' '--disable-krb4' '--disable-gssapi' '--disable-gss_mutexes' '--enable-plain' '--disable-anon' '--enable-login' '--disable-ntlm' '--disable-passdss' '--enable-sql' '--disable-ldapdb' 'CC=gcc' 'CPPFLAGS=-I/usr/local/berkeley-db/include - -I/System/Library/Frameworks/JavaVM.framework/Versions/CurrentJDK/Headers' 'LDFLAGS=-bind_at_load -ldl -L/usr/local/berkeley-db/lib -ldb - -F/System/Library/Frameworks -framework JavaVM' - --cache-file=.././config.cache --srcdir=. config/configure: config/configure: No such file or directory configure: error: /bin/sh config/configure failed for saslauthd
checking, i note:
ls -al /usr/ports/cyrus/cyrus-sasl-cvs/saslauthd/config/
CVS/ config.guess config.sub depcomp install-sh ltconfig ltmain.sh missing mkinstalldirs
